name: Fyz and Now in Olympic Games of Tartarus
name_original: Fyz and Now in Olympic Games of Tartarus
description:
Help the friends Fyz (Capybara) and Now (Armadillo) to give your best in the Olympic Games of Tartarus, in this Puzzle + Roguelite game created in 3 days by The Gaiden for the Mini Jam 71.

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/gaiden.exe/

Twitter: https://twitter.com/the_gaiden
